titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to ensure that an order to serve on active duty under section 12304b of that title is treated the same as other orders to serve on active duty for determining the eligibility of members of the uniformed services for early retirement pay.

To amend title 10, United States Code, to ensure that an order to serve on active duty under section 12304b of that title is treated the same as other orders to serve on active duty for determining the eligibility of members of the uniformed services for early retirement pay.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
